Player History
Drafted in 2nd round, 39th overall pick, by New York (A) in 1982...
Released by New York (A) on 3/2/1982...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago (N) on 3/2/1982 to a minor league deal...
Injured on 7/23/1984 with a Torn Abdominal Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Had first career hit on 5/19/1986, off Don Aase (STL)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/22/1986, off Dennis Lewallyn (SF)...
Traded from Chicago (N) to Chicago (A) on 7/31/1986 (Going to CHC: CF K. Gibson, P D. Stewart. Going to CHW: LF M. Greenwell, RF J. Buhner, CF L. Dykstra, P G. Swindell, 1B F. Stubbs)...
Drove in 7 runs against Detroit on 5/24/1988...
